title: What it will take to distribute the vaccine
description:
As the country awaits FDA approval for a coronavirus vaccine, what questions should we be asking about how it will be distributed? Recode’s Rebecca Heilweil discusses some of the challenges vaccine distributors and health care providers may encounter from dry ice shortages to dose tracking.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
